laboratory_examinations.findings: CT of the abdomen shows a tubular structure in the right lower quadrant measuring 11 mm likely reflecting an abnormal inflamed appendix with thickened edematous walls. A heterogeneous area in the right lower quadrant measures 5.1 x 3.3 cm concerning for phlegmon. No drainable fluid collection or extraluminal gas is noted. Small amount of mildly complex free fluid surrounds the large phlegmonous region in the right pelvis.
